standards.digital.health.nz

HPI Facility ID

URI

https://standards.digital.health.nz/id/hpi-facility

Namespace type

Identifier

Description

This namespace is used for the HPI identifiers assigned to health facilities in New Zealand.

For more information on the HPI facility ID see the Ministry of Healthâ€™s website.
